name: Tales of Link
storyline:
When Ruin Falls from the Heavens, Hope Will Rise from the Earth Below.

In the peaceful world of Liafyse, the gods in the Heavens watch over the people of the surface world. One day, the seal is broken on a heavenly temple, and the "seeds of ruin" stored within are unleashed. The seeds lay waste to the gods before falling to the earth below. They contain the essences of monstrous ruinators that had been sealed away, and having stolen the gods power, if allowed to grow they will sow calamity throughout the surface world. The goddess Leonne, the last surviving deity in the Heavens, uses what remains of her power to slow their growth. She then sends her sprite retainer to the surface world to find the "Great Savior" and seal away the seeds once more.

The protagonist awakens to find himself bereft of memories and staring at a sprite named Lippy and a girl named Sara. Lippy refers to the boy as "the Great Savior," and asks him to use the hero-summoning power of stonecantation to help purify their world. And thus, their adventure across a vast world begins. But none among the three friends can even imagine where their journey of purification will take them...
summary:
Tales of Link was a mobile game with a puzzle combat system instead of a variation on the Linear Motion Battle System (LMBS) the series is known for. The combat involved linking units on a 3x3 grid by color or type to unleash attacks and Artes that would be stronger based on their place in the chain,

It featured characters from most of the past Tales of games as well as crossover characters and events from God Eater 2: Rage Burst, Brave Frontier, Kai-ri-Sei Million Arthur and Sword Art Online: Code Register.

The game was shutdown in 2018.
